question: 786. Please can you give me the hadith which says something to the effect of : reward for accepting a returned item.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Hadhrat Abu Hurayra (Radhiallaahu Anhu) narrates that Rasulullah
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) said, 'Whoever makes Iqaalah, Allah Ta'ala
will conceal his faults and mistakes. (Abu Dawud; Ibn Maajah)

Iqaalah means the acceptance of the seller to take back the sold item at the
request of the purchaser. (Nasbur Raaya)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
